rules_text: Whenever an Aura you control becomes attached to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, Ichorspine Kirin deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: [i]Many monsters on Azgol have resistances to magic. Others have adaptations specifically able to rout would be spellcasting predators.[/i]
notes: REE (need more curse cards, subject to change?)
